title: Divinity: Original Sin v1.0.81 Update
description:
Divinity: Original Sin Version: v1.0.81 Update Supported languages: Eng -Release Group: RELOADED Protection: Steam Version Required: any

1. Unrar. 
  2. Install the Update. No further Update is needed for this release. 
  3. Copy over the Cracked content from the / Crack Directory on the Image to 
     your game install Directory. 
  4. Play the game. 
  5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!


 Gather your Party and Get Ready for A New, back-to-the- Roots RPG adventure! 
  Discuss with your Decisions Companions; Fight foes in Turn-based Combat; 
  Explore an Open World and Interact with everything and everyone you See. 
  Join up with A friend to play in co-Online OP and make your own Adventures 
  with the powerful RPG toolkit.

  In Divinity: Original Sin you Take on the Role of A young Hunter Source: 
  your job is to RID of the World Those WHO use the foulest of Magics. 
  When you embark on What Should have Been A Murder Investigation routine, 
  Suddenly you Find yourself in the Middle of A Plot That Will Rattle the 
  very fabric of time.

  Divinity: Original Sin is A game That Gives you A lot of freedom and 
  Plenty of gameplay Mechanics to use or abuse. The game's epic Story May 
  Drive you Toward your Ultimate end-Goal, but How you Get there is Entirely 
  up to you.

  Or up to you and A friend, Because Divinity: Original Sin can be Played 
  completely cooperatively, and Features both Online and local drop-in / 
  drop-out Multiplayer. Great Adventures Become even Greater When Shared with 
  A trusted Comrade-in-arms!
